title: Demi Lovato’s alleged nudes leak as her Snapchat account is hacked
text:
Demi’s Snapchat was hacked (Picture: Instagram)

Demi Lovato’s alleged nudes have been leaked after her Snapchat account was hacked.

The 27-year-old was the target of a hacking overnight, with a group taking over her official Snapchat account @ddlovato.

A message reading ‘Join this discord server for my nudes’ with a swipe-up link was added to her snaps, before an image of a naked brunette, purported to be the Sorry Not Sorry singer, was shown.

The image read: ‘Join the chuckling squad discord for more.’

The star’s team has been working to remove the images (Picture: Snapchat)

Another post read: ‘Add my boyfriend @ssimon666.’

The messages have been removed from Demi’s Snapchat, with The Blast reporting that the star’s team has been working on getting the images removed from online forums.

The website claims that the hackers taking responsibility are the same group that recently took over Twitter CEO Jack Dorsey’s account, and that were linked to an alleged photo leak of Chloe Grace Moretz.

Demi has been having a tough time (Picture: Ari Perilstein/Getty Images)

Demi is going through a tough time after the death of her friend Thomas, who died following a battle with substance abuse.

The Cool For The Summer singer got a ‘T’ tattooed on her arm in honour of her friend, which she revealed alongside a series of pictures of Thomas on Instagram.

Demi wrote: ‘A T for Tommy. RIP you special angel. Love you forever @sirtruss 🖤💔 thank you for the ink @rafael_valdez.. it’s beautiful and I’m so grateful for this 🙏🏼🙌🏼 If you or someone you know is struggling with addiction, please do not hesitate to ask for help. Please call 877.921.9653.’

The former Disney star has had her own battles with addiction, suffering a near-fatal overdose last year.

Metro.co.uk has contacted Demi’s rep for comment.
